mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_ID ,CONTENT_TYPE_ID ,TITLE ,ADDR1 ,ADDR2 ,ZIP_CODE ,AREA_CODE ,FIRST_IMAGE ,COUNT ,ROWNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM TRIP WHERE FIRST_IMAGE IS NOT NULL AND CONTENT_TYPE_ID = '12' ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 100

SELECT TITLE,FIRST_IMAGE2,CONTENT_ID,cnt FROM ( SELECT TITLE,cnt FROM ( SELECT TITLE,COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM WC GROUP BY title ORDER BY cnt ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 ) JOIN trip using(title) ORDER BY cnt desc
